data.analysis:
Sentence breakdown
- Nå og da — occasionally / from time to time
- går jeg — I go
- på tur — for a walk / on an outing

sections.title: Sentence breakdown
bullets: Nå og da — occasionally / from time to time
på tur — for a walk / on an outing

data.sentenceTranslation: From time to time I go for a walk

breakdown.tr: for a walk / on an outing

examples.no: Nå og da leser jeg en bok.
examples.tr: From time to time I read a book.

examples.no: Hun besøker oss nå og da.

ai_debug.system:
You are an expert Norwegian (Bokmål) tutor.
Write ONLY in English.
Norwegian is allowed ONLY inside: expressions[].expression and expressions[].examples[].no.
Return ONLY valid JSON (no markdown fences, no extra text).
Style: very simple, learner-friendly, short sections and bullets. No heavy linguistics.
ai_debug.user:
Sentence:
"Nå og da går jeg på tur"

Task:
1) sentenceTranslation: give a natural translation.
2) breakdown: give a short breakdown into meaningful parts.
   - 3-6 items, short and clear.
   - Each item: Norwegian chunk (2-6 words) + short meaning in English.
   - Use ONLY English in meanings and title.
   - Norwegian is allowed ONLY in breakdown[].no.
3) expressions: list 0-3 fixed expressions / collocations used in the sentence.
   - Base form if possible.
   - Short translation in English.
   - For each expression, add EXACTLY 2 short Norwegian examples with translations in English.
   - Examples must be different from the original sentence.

Rules:
- Use meaningful parts only (no single function words).
- Keep it compact.

Return JSON EXACTLY in this schema:
{
  "sentenceTranslation": "natural translation of the full sentence in English",
  "breakdownTitle": "short title in English",
  "breakdown": [
    {
      "no": "Norwegian chunk (2-6 words)",
      "tr": "short meaning in English"
    }
  ],
  "expressions": [
    {
      "expression": "expression in Norwegian (grunnform if possible)",
      "translation": "short translation in English",
      "examples": [
        { "no": "short Norwegian example", "tr": "translation in English" }
      ]
    }
  ]
}
